Client.Title: Fortnite Client
Client.status: Made by Syfe, Kekistan added commands, and many many other things :)

Features.Title: Features for the bot!
Features.__comment: To disable a feature replace true with false, to enable a feature replace false with true.

copy.__comment: Puts on or does whatever you do, examples: doing a emote.

Cosmetics.Title: Cosmetics for the bot!
Cosmetics.__comment: Puts on the cid, bid, eid, pickaxe_id, and ect on the bot.
